mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, `name`, email, phone FROM class_stu cs LEFT JOIN `user` ON `user`.user_id = cs.stu_id WHERE cs.class_id = #{id} ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM `user` WHERE role_id = 3 AND user_id NOT IN ( SELECT cs.stu_id FROM class_stu cs WHERE cs.class_id = #{id} ) ORDER BY user_id

SELECT c.class_id, c.class_name, `user`.`name`, `user`.email, `user`.phone FROM class_stu cs LEFT JOIN class c ON c.class_id = cs.class_id LEFT JOIN `user` ON user_id = c.teacher_id WHERE cs.stu_id = #{id}
